channel.title: HELP ME with DEDICATED server!
channel.description:
I have all the files uploaded and everything but how can i make the server run??? I have tried everything...
Even tried what someone said (look below) ______________________________________________________________________________________________________
Everything is fixed on my dedi server BUT,
when i run the below code:
[code] #!/bin/bash /usr/bin/javac -cp . *java [/code]
OR...
[code] #!/bin/bash /usr/bin/java -cp .:./classes server [/code]"
I get Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: server
Anyone know what i can do or what im doing wrong?
MY GUESS IS THAT I NEED TO SET MY CLASS PATHS?

item.title: HELP ME with DEDICATED server!
item.dc:creator: @Budda Budda
item.description:
@Budda wrote:

[quote=“God of Ikiliki, post:56, topic:171785”][quote author=ThugLife link=topic=231866.msg1985762#msg1985762 date=1199831304]
You are all fucking idiots.

If your server has an ftp server running on it, upload it through that and then download some sort of ssh client, ssh into the server with the details your host should of provided you with.

Once you’re connected with your ssh client, type in “cd /the/name/of/the/directory/you/uploaded/your/server/to/” then type “java server”.
kdone.

I left out most of the details, what i told you was basically what you will be doing, its upto you to look up things you do not know on google.
[/quote]Perhaps you go away if you can only flame?
Thanks Fr33sc4p3[/quote]

Perhaps you go away if you can only fag?
Thanks faggot

Read full topic

“[19:45:20] Continue to login attempt 3…
[19:45:20] Resolving host name “72.167.49.170”
[19:45:20] Connecting to 72.167.49.170 Port: 21
[19:45:41] A connection attempt failed because the connected party did not properly respond after a period of time, or established connection failed because connected host has failed to respond.
